Articles.Content:
Hello, there! I\'ve been lurking around the forums for the past few days, and I\'ve finally gotten around to creating an actual account so I can post things ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I\'m really interested in ship-building and the roleplay part of the forums, so you\'ll probably see me most around the Spacecraft Exchange and the Roleplaying forums.

-Jeb\_Kerman
Welcome to the forums,,You\'ll love it,, ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome to the forums.

Feel free to sample any and all of the rocket fuel for you rockets. Have fun.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
